title: C'mon Riot
body:
I wanted to play a quick match before dinner and decided to play good ole 3v3 on TT so i get into the match and realize that my team members and the enemy team are all bots.

I thought you were supposed to be fixing this Riot c'mon. 

If you're not going to support TT at least give us the option to play the old TT map.

replies.body:
down votes why?

did i offend someone running a bot porgram
riot wont do anything. If its not summoners rift then they give 0 shits. Esports too important

This happened to me too, except there were 2 human players on their team. I stood no chance. They just got fed off of my allies and rolled through. I only played through to report the accounts, all 3 of them.
